relnotes.name: Bluetooth Logger

defect.title: .esk and .cmi files do not have header
HCI Snoop logger can spin if path not present

relnotes.defect: Added comments to CHCILoggerBTSnoop::OpenFile() to document that potential KErrPathNotFound error is intentionally ignored.

defect.title: BTSnooplogger logs to c drive on armv5

relnotes.defect: BTSnooplogger now logs to E drive for non __WINS__ builds. Requires manual creation of \shared\hcilogger\ folder.
Fix included undefining ASSERT; reworked code using ASSERT.

defect.title: errors in IM tagging in shortlink
Add a btlogger method to log a TBTDevAddr
Generic BT logger: missing useful bits

relnotes.defect: Added VerboseLeaveL on the same pattern as VerboseLeaveIfErrorL

defect.title: Generic BT logger: incorrect leave if error behaviour

relnotes.defect: Condition modified to capture the incorrect leave

defect.title: Problem with __UREL_RDEBUG_PRINT macro in bt generic logger

relnotes.defect: Fixed RDebug Output during UDEB builds
